name: Party Games: 15 in 1
description:
Party games features 15 fun-packed party games for up to 4 players! It's the ultimate MUST-HAVE game for family and friends of all ages. 

• Everything from action, to puzzle, to sports...it’s all here in Party Games!
• It wouldn’t be a party without friends! Up to 4 players can join in the fun for some friendly competitive play.
• Party anytime, anywhere! Enjoy single-player or local multiplayer gaming from just about anywhere on the planet with just one system and one game.
intro: Everything from action, to puzzle, to sports...it’s all here in Party Games!
